channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On the geometry of metallic pseudo-Riemannian structures
item.description: arXiv:1811.10406v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We generalize the notion of metallic structure in the pseudo-Riemannian setting, define the metallic Norden structure and study its integrability. We consider metallic maps between metallic manifolds and give conditions under which they are constant. We also construct a metallic natural connection recovering as particular case the Ganchev and Mihova connection, which we extend to a metallic natural connection on the generalized tangent bundle. Moreover, we construct metallic pseudo-Riemannian structures on the tangent and cotangent bundles.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: Rivista di Matematica della Universit\`a di Parma, vol. 11, no. 1, 2020, (69-87)
item.dc:creator: Adara M. Blaga, Antonella Nannicini
